comment: The Sashimi was fresh and delicious. Loved the presentation!
The Nigiri was perfect, and the soy sauce added a nice touch. Will order again!
Maki was good, but a bit small. The ginger was a nice palate cleanser.
Enjoyed the Tempura Roll, crispy and flavorful. Soy sauce complemented it well.
The Dragon Roll was amazing! A perfect blend of flavors and textures.
Rainbow Roll was decent, but the soy sauce was missed. Good overall.
Spicy Tuna Roll had the right amount of kick. Highly recommended!
Salmon Nigiri was fresh, and the ginger added a nice zing. Enjoyable.
Eel Roll was tasty and satisfying. A good choice for sushi lovers.
Vegetarian Roll was decent, but could use more variety in ingredients.
